name: In the House of my Father
name_original: In the House of my Father
description:
In the House of my Father is an excel spreadsheet featuring a recreation of the Secaucus Junction train station in New Jersey from memory. Interaction is limited, but the NPCs scattered around have some interesting things to say.

This is a stripped down and simplified version of a larger game I've had in the works for some time now. Maybe that one will never be finished, who's to say.
